name: Fun Race - Emoji Runner
description:
All you need to make a great runner is run, jump, win!

Funny Emoji compete with each other to be the first to the finish line.

You can use items in the arena to gain an advantage over your opponents.

Raise your rating by defeating your opponents!

Create a unique style for your character.

Level up your character according to your winning technique.

Peculiarities:

● Simple and intuitive operation

● Beautiful graphics and pleasant music

● Large selection of Character Styles (Colors, Emoji, Drawings)

● Character Development (Health, Energy, Speed, Strengthening Items)

● Balanced enemy AI

● Infinite levels

● Daily Challenges and Daily Bonuses

Fun Race - Emoji Runner - A free mobile game designed for a fun pastime.
